name: Alien Escape (itch) (Erick1310)
description:
You are John, a scientist who invented a weapon that what you shoot goes back to the past. But some aliens kidnapped you so they could steal your invention. Now you have to escape from thier  spaceship, but it won't be easy.

~CONTROLS~

  • AD - To move.
  • Space bar- To Jump.
  • Left Click- To shoot.
  • You can aim with your mouse!

This is a game made for the Brackeys GameJam 2020.2.

Have fun!!
